Asked by mohammad | 19th Apr, 2019, 01:10: PM
Expert Answer:
Genetics is a branch of biology that is concerned with the study of heredity and the transmission and variation of traits. It includes the study of the mechanisms by which traits are passed on from one generation to the next.
